name: A Hat in Time

files.install: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- d9vk: https://github.com/Joshua-Ashton/d9vk/releases/download/0.13f/d9vk-0.13f.tar.gz
- install: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/A Hat in Time/Binaries/Win64/HatinTimeGame.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxvk-release/
    file: d9vk
- copy:
    dst: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runtime/dxvk/d9vk-0.13f/
    src: $CACHE/dxvk-release/
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /VERYSILENT /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    description: Installing the Game
    executable: install
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    PULSE_LATENCY_MSEC: 60
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  dxvk_version: d9vk-0.13f
  version: ge-protonified-4.9-x86_64
